resources.string: Take attendance using Aleph Wifi Connection
This app needs permissions to access your wifi network to verify your attendance
* No personal or private data is collected
Required to accurately verify attendance using Wi-Fi
To ensure consistent automatic attendance, you can enable optional settings above.
The app cannot run in background (including on device boot) if required permissions are not granted.
This allows the app to run in the background without being killed by the system\'s battery saving features.
Allow location permission all the time
Required to accurately verify attendance using Wi-Fi in the background
Required by Android to inform you that this app is running in the background
Run in background on device boot
Automatically starts the app in background when your device turns on
